Trade/Device Name(s): Oral Fluid Methadone Homogeneous Enzyme Immunoassay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Lin-Zhi International Oral Fluid Methadone Homogeneous Enzyme Immunoassay, Calibrator, and Controls for qualitative detection of methadone in oral fluid.
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative determination of methadone in human oral fluid using a homogeneous enzyme immunoassay with Salivette collector and buffer; intended for professional use with automated clinical chemistry analyzers, provides preliminary results requiring confirmatory testing.
